Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
burp \burp\, burping \burping\n. a reflex that expels wind noisily from the stomach through the mouth.
Syn: belch, belching, burping, eructation. [WordNet 1.5]
burping n : a reflex that expels wind noisily from the stomach through the mouth [syn: {belch}, {belching}, {burp}, {eructation}]
